column1: Come to a sudden and premature end
column3: ['Cataclysm', 'Collapse', 'Downfall', 'Eclipse', 'Extinction', 'Fizzle', 'Finis', 'Flattening', 'Flash (in the context of an unforeseen event)', 'Hiatus (though it implies a temporary end, can suggest sudden closure in some cases)', 'Implosion', 'Nullify', 'Oscillation (when referring to something that ends abruptly after being off-balance)', 'Perish', 'Premature termination', 'Rupture', 'Sudden death', 'Terminate', 'Vanishing', 'Wane']
